short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow selecting, copying, pasting and right clicking in some restricted pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is Enable Copy?
'Enable Copy' is a browser extension that empowers the user by removing restrictive actions in web browsing such as selecting, copying, and pasting text on some web pages as well as enabling right-clicks. With just one click on the Enable Copy icon, the grey icon turns dark indicating that the restriction has been lifted for the current and all subsequent pages of the specific website. Clicking the icon again will restore the restrictions.

"Enable Copy" adds context menu for sharing the selected content to facebook, linkedin, twitter
